transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes. Hanji, Sarfaraz baat kar raha hun main, ek minute sun sakte hain.
Customer: Ji sir. Awaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Aa rahi hai, aa rahi hai, awaz aa rahi hai Sarfaraz sir.
Customer: Achcha, meri ek complaint thi aur us complaint ko close kyun kar diya gaya hai, mujhe yeh jaanna hai. Jab uska koi solution nahi hua hai, to usko close kyun kiya hai aap logon ne?
Executive: Number bataiye, company ka number bataiye, naam bataiye jis company se aapne complaint rakhi thi.
Customer: Woh hai Plus Incorporation.

Executive: Isme likha hai ki in logon ne client se baat kari hai, hum logon ne aur client Sahil ke touch mein hai.
Customer: Sahil ke touch mein, Sahil kya koi Modi ji kursi pe baitha hai jo mann karega wohi likh dega, close kar dega. Ek aur baat inhone highlight kiya hua hai ki abusive language civil staff ko di gayi hai. Aur apology. Meri baat suniye, jab sari cheeze clear ho gayi hai, apology letter mil gaya unko aur woh material deliver nahi kiya hai, to close kaise kaise kar diya bina bujhe mere se?
Executive: Yahan pe likha hai na ki dobara daliye na fir aap agar aapko dalna hai to dobara daliye, kahiye ki abhi mila nahi hai, wohi purani wali complaint 9696 pe call kijiye aur kya.
Customer: To main wohi to puch raha hun na, yeh close kyun kiya hai? Aise kaise close kar diya hai? Paisa kaun dega mera? Meri baat suniye. Meri baat suniye. Mera paisa kaun dega? Hai koi jawabdar? Na material mila, na paisa mila hai. Main IndiaMART ke upar dalunga na yeh sari cheeze. 
Executive: Haan, haan, wohi to main aapse keh raha hun, isliye to keh raha hun aapse sir, dekhiye aapne thoda sa galti aapki wahan pe bhi ho gayi na sir, aapne gaali wali bak di unko, media staff ko.
Customer: Bilkul dena padega, dena padega, agla aadmi jab.
Executive: Sir, lijiye. Yeh batao bar bar failure ho raha hai, to uske bharose mein baitha rahunga, mera order cancel hone ko baat ho rahi hai.
Customer: Sir, achcha yeh bataiye gaali dene se mil gaya aapko? Nahi woh nahi keh raha hun, gaali. Dusri jagah se lene nahi de rahe, khud deliver nahi kar raha hai, kya karoge us condition mein?
Executive: Wohi to keh raha hun, gaali dene se to sir mila nahi hai aapko aur mamla kharab hi ho gaya. To kya matlab jo hume apna kaam nikalwana hai na sir, main to sabse important yeh hai, aapko product chahiye. 
Customer: Kaam nahi, main ek baat batao, woh woh woh mere pe mere upar ehsan kar raha hai kya? Saala ki paise de raha hun usko.
Executive: Wohi keh raha hun na, aap ek kaam kijiye, hamare customer care pe aap ek baar call kijiye 9696 pe aur fir se aap wohi sab conflict raise kijiye, kahiye ki still issue is not resolved and buyer and supplier is not sending the product. To fir se woh raise hoga na, kahiye isme daliye aap.
Customer: Fir fir se raise nahi hoga, main court mein khada karunga, aapki IndiaMART ki maa ki dal raha hun. Aur kya karenge?
Executive: Dekhiye woh to aap, aap dekhiye aapko pehle jo behtar lage lekin ek baar aap yahan se bhi to sari cheeze clear kijiye sir, yahan pe bhi ek baar baat karke woh kijiye.
Customer: Kis se, kis se baat karun main?
Executive: Wohi, wohi customer care pe call kijiye aap, fir se ticket khulega inka.
Customer: Customer care pe call kijiye aap. 9696 pe wohi complaint. Band, band, band kiya kyun hai jab iska resolution nikla hi nahi hai to band kyun kiya? 
Executive: Kyunki aapke discussion chal raha tha na sir, aapse discussion chal raha tha. Kis se? Kis, kis ka discussion chala hai mera isse?
Executive: Wohi, wohi jo company hai Plus Incorporation wale unhone recording wagera sab dekh li hai yahan pe, uske basis pe band hua hai.
Customer: Uske basis pe band hua hai, to matlab paisa kha jayega woh, material bhi nahi dega, paise bhi nahi dega woh.
Executive: Nahi, nahi sir, paisa kaun kha sakta hai sir aapke time mein, isliye to keh raha hun paid supplier hai sir IndiaMART ke aap complaint raise kijiye woh definitely action hoga, aap raise to kijiye. Main bata to raha hun aapko solution ka way.
Customer: To mujhe is baat ka jawab chahiye, band kyun kiya gaya hai? Wahi, wahi woh unse puchiye na dobara aap unse. Iska matlab iska matlab yeh hai ki aap log chahte ho ki hum dono item apne paas rakhe, paisa bhi na de. 
Executive: Nahi, nahi, kuch bhi nahi, aap, aap unse baat kijiye. To fir aap logon ne band kyun kar di? Mujhe is baat ka jawab chahiye. Yahi, yahi jawab aapko milega jab aap baat karenge customer care se, unse puchiyega ki aapne kaise band kar diya, wahan pe woh aapko proper answer denge.
Customer: Yeh customer care pe nahi hai, yeh kis number pe hai?
Executive: Aapne kis number pe 9696 pe kiya hai kya call?
Customer: India, IndiaMART pe Nidhi ji ke paas maine call lagaya hai, pehle bhi maine jo complaint registered karai woh Nidhi ko hi. Abhi jo call kiya hai aapne kis number pe call kiya? Nidhi, maine Nidhi ke personal number pe jo IndiaMART ka lot number hai usko call kiya. 
Executive: Haan, haan Nidhi ka, jaise Nidhi ka number hai aur Nidhi se call mere number pe divert ho jata hai sir. To aapko kya karna hai na, aapko 9696 jo hamara IndiaMART ka customer Tausif baat kar raha hun sir, aapko yaad hoga meri baat hoti thi aapse.
Customer: Haan, bilkul meri baat hoti thi. Tausif ji, main jab bar bar ek hi baat bolte aa raha hun, to iska matlab aap log chahte ho ki dono item mein chhod dun main. 
Executive: Kaise chhod doge sir, aapka paisa laga hua hai, aap kaise chhod doge sir? Woh nahi keh raha hun, main isliye to keh raha hun aapko, aap customer care pe ek baar call kijiye aur unse puchiye. Mujhe, mujhe yeh bata do, uski Sahil ki itni himmat kaise hui jo usne woh ticket close kiya hai?
Executive: Wohi keh raha hun sir, isliye to aap ek baar. Mere se agar koi bhi, mere se koi discussion hui ho aur mere se usne bola ho, bola sir hum ticket ko close kar rahe hain, isko complaint ko close kar rahe hain, kis liye kiya gaya hai? Jab iska koi solution nahi nikla hai, is baat ka koi jawab mujhe jo hai kis tarike se milega? Yeh bata do aap. 
Executive: Ji, ji. To wohi keh raha hun, aapki iske liye puri dedicated team hoti hai sir. Main dedicated team ke bare mein mujhe nahi pata, IndiaMART. Dekhiye aapko hamare side se kya chahiye tha, aapne mere matlab meri team mein aapka account tha, hum log servicing department se hain aur aapne mujhse kaha ki mujhe refund karwa do, mujhe business nahi karna hai, maine woh pura aapka refund karwa diya. Ab yeh jo team hai, yeh team alag hai. Refund mein, refund mein cut, cutting kiya hai aap logon ne. Sir, sir refund mein process hota hai na, sir jitni aap samjho IndiaMART ko pay karta hai na sir server ko, aapki jab listing ka aapka jitne din time chali, service chali utna din ka to pay out aapko. Ek kaam kariye, ek kaam, ek kaam kariye na, aap jo hai usko line pe lijiye jisne mera ticket block kara hai, line pe lo aur main baat karta hun usse. 
Executive: Sir, line pe lo, aapka department hai. Main bata raha hun, aaj office ki chutti hoti hai, Saturday, Sunday off hota hai. Maine to dekha ki aapka call tha to maine utha liya. Aap ek kaam kijiye na, aap 9696 pe call kijiye ya customer care@indiamart.com pe mail type karke bhejiye. To turant aapko sunwai hogi sir. Aisa thodi na hai ki hum yahan pe chhod dete hain. Abhi dekhiye ek ek cheez ka. Ek ek cheez ka pura data maintain hota hai sir. Sir, main aapki baat suniye aap. Sir, dedh mahine, dedh mahine, dedh mahine se abhi talak to koi sunwai hui nahi hai. Sir, ab dekho, woh thoda sa. Dedh mahine se, dedh mahine se main, main is usme wait mein baitha hun ki kab mere se baat cheet ke liye iske liye phone aayega, bola sir hum aapka is solution ka kaise karna hai, kya karna hai, iska kya solution nikala hai. To is main is wait mein baitha hun aur woh thodi si aapki bhi galti ho gayi na sir ek wahan pe. Jo gaali wali bak di aapne. To majburi mein kya karega aadmi, dena padega na woh to, dena hi padega. Kyunki dekho meri baat suno, woh deliver kar nahi raha, dusri jagah se order lene nahi de raha. Hmm? To kya karoge? Nahi to woh staff ko, staff ki dene se kya hota hai sir, staff dekhiye, staff to woh khud hi naukri kar raha hai, aap owner ko ek baar ko gaali bakte chalo theek tha. Suniye, meri baat suniye, ab main aapko bata raha hun, jab mera sara deal, sari baat cheet sab kuch staff se hui hai, to main kisko bolunga? Kisko bolunga? Nahi woh to aap owner ka number seedhe lijiye na, aap owner se kahiye ki sir aisi aisi dikkat hai aap. Fir woh, fir wohi cheez uski teen bar failure date hui hai, three time. Jo unhone commitment di, jo time diya, jo delivery time diya, woh teen bar fail hui hai. Ek minute. Teen bar fail, fail hui hai woh sir.

Hello?
Hello.
Hello.

Hello?

Hello?
summary:
Concerns:

- Complaint was closed without resolution.

- Material not delivered, refund not received.

- Why the complaint was closed without informing.



Resolution:

- Executive advised to call customer care again.

- Executive explained the reason for closure.

- Executive explained refund process.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call customer care again.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, refund, closure, customer care
